name: TC1350-02 After marking the card, the number of marked cards increased by 1.
description: LMS-1350 возможность для юзера помечать., https://app.qase.io/plan/LMS/1?case=1350  Objective: To confirm the functionality allowing the user to mark a card for review and the amount of marked cards increased by 1.
descriptionHtml: LMS-1350 возможность для юзера помечать., https://app.qase.io/plan/LMS/1?case=1350 Objective: To confirm the functionality allowing the user to mark a card for review and the amount of marked cards increased by 1.

steps.name: User is logged into the application.
The active course has GOLD subscription.
User has navigated to the Home page.

testStage.description: LMS-1350 возможность для юзера помечать., https://app.qase.io/plan/LMS/1?case=1350  Objective: To confirm the functionality allowing the user to mark a card for review and the amount of marked cards increased by 1.

steps.name: Precondition: Get number questions marked before test.
Precondition: Start random domain test with 1 question(s).
Click 'Cansel' button to cancel dialog if visible.
Click 'Generate and Start' button to start the Tutor test.
Click 'Yes' button on dialog window if visible.
Click 'Skip' button on dialog window if visible.
Assert that number of questions marked before test (0) is increased by one and now equals 1.
